authenticate.title: Authentication

messages.success: Your user has been activated. Please authenticate.
messages.error: Your user could not be activated. Please use the registration form to sign up.

password.error: password should have at least 8 characters, contains atleast 1 number, 1 special character, 1 letter in caps
password.maxlength: password can't have more than 50 characters.
password.customError: Your password is not as per policy.

confirm-password.maxlength: password can't have more than 50 characters.

authenticate.instruction: Password should have atleast 8 characters, contains atleast 1 number, 1 special character, 1 letter in caps.
